channel.title: math.GN updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GN updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Simple polynomial equations over $(2 \times 2)$-matrices
item.description: arXiv:2506.07689v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We consider the polynomial equation $$X^n + a_{n-1}\cdot X^{n-1} + \dots + a_1 \cdot X + a_0 \cdot I = O,$$ over $(2 \times 2)$-matrices $X$ with the real entries, where $I$ is the identity matrix, $O$ is the null matrix, $a_i \in \mathbb R$ for each $i$ and $n \geq 2$. We discuss its solution set $S$ supplied with the natural Euclidean topology. We completely describe $S$. We also show that $\dim S =2.$
item.dc:creator: Vitalij A. Chatyrko, Alexandre Karassev

item.title: Labeled Trees Generating Separable and Locally Finite Ultrametrics
item.description: arXiv:2506.03853v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We analyze the interplay between labeled trees and the ultrametric spaces they present. We provide characterizations of labeled trees that generate separable ultrametric spaces and those that generate locally finite ultrametric spaces. In particular, we establish an analog of K\"onig's Infinity Lemma for locally finite ultrametric spaces generated by labeled trees.
item.dc:creator: Oleksiy Dovgoshey, Olga Rovenska
